TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AppSettingsExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

Docs.summary: Retrieves values, as specified in a declarative expression, from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>類別會提供存取值在`<appSettings>`Web.config 檔案區段。 `<appSettings>` Web.config 檔案區段包含索引鍵/值組中的應用程式專屬值。
擷取應用程式值是將表單的運算式
`<%$ AppSettings: appSettingsKey %>`
若要控制宣告中的屬性。 冒號 （:） 的部分指定運算式來擷取，並將部分的類型後使用冒號表示索引鍵。 上述運算式會擷取下列值從 Web.config 檔案。
`<appSettings>`
`<add key="appSettingsKey" value="appSettingsValue"/>`
`</appSettings>`
當頁面剖析器遇到具有運算式`AppSettings`前置詞，它會建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>類別處理的運算式。
如果將編譯的頁面中遇到，則運算式<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>物件產生的程式碼，以從 Web.config 檔案中擷取指定的值。 此程式碼會產生的網頁類別的執行期間執行。 如果運算式發生在單一頁面將不會編譯，以<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>物件時，傳回值 Web.config 檔案中的剖析和執行網頁。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取未編譯的頁面中的應用程式設定值。
[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)]
此程式碼會擷取下列運算式從 Web.config 檔案。
`<configuration xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/.NetConfiguration/v2.0">`
`<appSettings>`
`<add key="thisSeason" value="Fall"/>`
`</appSettings>`
`</configuration>`

Docs.summary: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當表單的運算式時，會呼叫這個方法`<%$ AppSettings: someApplicationSetting %>`發生無編譯網頁中。 它會擷取適當的值中的索引鍵/值組從`<appSettings>`Web.config 檔案區段。 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.GetAppSetting%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.BoundPropertyEntry.Expression%2A>屬性做為`key`參數，<xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry.Name%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.PropertyEntry.PropertyInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性做為`propertyName`參數和<xref:System.Type>的`target`參數做為`targetType`參數。

Docs.summary: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file.

.method public static hidebysig object GetAppSetting(string key) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAppSetting (key As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetAppSetting(System::String ^ key);
static member GetAppSetting : string -> obj

Docs.param: The key for the value to be retrieved from the configuration file.
Docs.summary: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file.
Docs.returns: The associated with the key in the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取適當的值中的索引鍵/值組從`<appSettings>`Web.config 檔案區段。 它會擷取值，藉由取得<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>具有做為索引鍵屬性。 <xref:System.Object>傳回型別是<xref:System.String>。

Docs.exception: The key is not found in Web.config.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetAppSetting (string key, Type targetType, string propertyName);

Public Shared Function GetAppSetting (key As String, targetType As Type, propertyName As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetAppSetting(System::String ^ key, Type ^ targetType, System::String ^ propertyName);
static member GetAppSetting : string * Type * string -> obj

Docs.param: The key for a value to be retrieved from the configuration file.
The type of the object that contains the property entry.
The name of the property to which the expression is bound.
Docs.summary: Returns a value from the section of the Web.config file with the value converted to a target type.
Docs.returns: The associated with the key in the section of the Web.config file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取適當的值中的索引鍵/值組從`<appSettings>`Web.config 檔案區段。 值藉由取得擷取<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager.AppSettings%2A>具有做為索引鍵屬性。 產生的字串值會轉換成新類型，根據`targetType`和`propertyName`參數。

Docs.exception: The key is not found in Web.config. \- or - The return value could not be converted.

The object that represents parsed data as returned by .

Docs.summary: Returns a code expression that is used to perform the property assignment in the generated page class.
Docs.returns: A that is used in the property assignment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 網頁或控制項 CodeDOM 建立期間呼叫這個方法。 傳回<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>物件代表要加入產生的頁面類別的屬性指派的程式碼運算式。

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsEvaluate { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsEvaluate
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsEvaluate As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsEvaluate { bool get(); };
member this.SupportsEvaluate : bool

Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that is not compiled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.SupportsEvaluate%2A>屬性會指出是否<xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A>方法已在類別中實作，並可傳回運算式的值。 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder.EvaluateExpression%2A> 必須實作內的運算式評估中的頁面，就不會編譯運算式產生器。 <xref:System.Web.Compilation.AppSettingsExpressionBuilder>類別會支援在單一頁面未編譯，以評估應用程式設定讓它永遠都會傳回`true`。
